title: BRIEF-Insurance Australia Group Updates On Redemption of $550 mln Reset Exchangeable Securities
text:
BRIEF-Insurance Australia Group Updates On Redemption of $550 mln Reset Exchangeable Securities

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 20, 2019 17:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Insurance Australia Group Updates On Redemption of $550 mln Reset Exchangeable Securities Sept 20 (Reuters) - Insurance Australia Group Ltd : * CO & UNIT IAG (LON: ) FINANCE GIVE NOTICE THAT ALL OUTSTANDING RESET EXCHANGEABLE SECURITIES TO BE REDEEMED ON RESET DATE OF 16 DEC * ON 16 DEC, EACH RES HOLDER TO RECEIVE FACE VALUE OF $100 PLUS FINAL INTEREST PAYMENT OF $0.9656 FOR EACH RES HELD ON 6 DEC * LAST DAY OF TRADING OF RES ON AUSTRALIAN SECURITIES EXCHANGE WILL BE 4 DEC 2019

BRIEF-Insurance Australia Group Updates On Redemption of $550 mln Reset Exchangeable Securities
description: BRIEF-Insurance Australia Group Updates On Redemption of $550 mln Reset Exchangeable Securities
